text: 🚨 Energy crisis update! 💡 Who has the priciest electricity and gas in Europe? 🤔 After Russia's invasion of Ukraine, pre-tax prices soared, but they're now on the decline. 📉 But which countries have the highest and lowest prices? 🤷‍♂️ And how much have electricity and natural gas prices increased since February 2022? 💸 Find out! 👉
